creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: large beanie-style cap of brown cotton with blue lining; cap covered overall in various metal pendants, stamped elements with flowers and linear designs, bells and pendants with inlaid glass; top domed metal element with long tube embellished with beads and petal-shaped pendants and triangular cloth element with pile needlework design on one side (reverse has appearance of needlepoint), trimmed in black twisted fringe with white beads; long back orange cloth tail with bright multicolored floral embroidery, trimmed in beaded fringe; cloth elements with metal pendants, and beaded and twisted yarn tassels at sides
title: Hat
